pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Automated Approach to Evaluating Dose-Effect Experiments Following Litchfield and Wilcoxon (1949) // The manual approach of Litchfield and Wilcoxon (1949) http://jpet.aspetjournals.org/content/96/2/99.abstract for evaluating dose-effect experiments is automated so that the computer can do the work.
